MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
For people working on Publication Websites, Reviewers and Testers. Thank you for all your work. We appreciate it. Your comments define our next idea. This code will activate Shareware with 42 editable Input and Target Values for 100 days.
DLROW-III-MODEL 2016 - 2020 - 2024 UNLIMITED UPGRADES

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost-profit optimizations.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost and benefit. We support Startups in quickly checking Business Plans and Options. We develop a platform for free business model calculations, called Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Description_450: ynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, profit, sales and product to market optimization. We support Startups to quickly check their Business Plan. We develop a free platform of small, beautiful, intuitive and self-explanatory business planners for everyone. We call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Keywords: 21st century, App, Developer, IoT, PV, Wind, Turbine, Forest, Energy, Truck, Pyramid, Simulations, Startup, Product, growth, business, plan, dynamicons, Dynamic Applications, Sharing Economy

Program_Info.Program_Categories: Kids & Parenting,Ethics & Responsibility,Ethics and Responsibility,Ethics,Society,Jura,Family,Home and Family,Education,Teaching Tools,Teaching,Home & Hobby,Home and Hobby,Personal Finance,Personal,Mathematics,Home,Hobby,Finance
Program_Info.Limitations: The integrated Formula Editors are only available for the Top 10 Input and Target Values.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Dynamic Applications releases Pyramid Simulations, focused around the most basic values of modern Society.
Pyramid Simulations is a collection of Small Business Simulations around our most basic values - Home and Family, Marriage, Startup, Father, Mother, Children, Youth Welfare, Lawyer, Court, Judge, State Attorney.
In 21st century, we take a look at the Patchwork Family. How can you survive a split-up, with 2 Rents to pay, 2 Cars to drive, Lawyers, Judge, and Court fees? - how about charges against Town and Court?
Pyramid Simulations - Law and order tries to answer even such complicated issues. A collection of useful Small Business is provided for the modern as well as for the traditional Family.
Transparency - All Calculations are fully self explanatory through automated ToolTips, with Formulas and live calculation in numbers.
Privacy Protection - no data gathering, no Server behind you. Switch off your Internet connection and check that out.
Participation - in the Dynamic Idea and Roadmap competition on Twitter, we vote for new Simulation ideas, features and bugfixes. Pay with a Tweet - we work from Top Votes.
The free version also allows you to Edit the Top 12 Input and Target Values. Free Promo Codes are hidden on the Website as well as in the Twitter competition. Through these, you can activate Input and Target Value inline editing for the Top 42 elements, for 100 days. After that, all basic functionality remains working, so if you're willing to live without a few paid Extras, you can use Dynamic Applications free of charge, for a lifetime.
All in all, Dynamic Applications is a reliable collection of proven Business Models, fully verifyable and brought on your desktop in the most easy form: a traditional Desktop Client. Simplicity, Beauty, Ergonomy and Reduction.
